column4: Did not require executive order if department of education closed all public schools. If spring break prior to closure, considered closure to begin on first day of spring break. If closure announced on weekend, first week day closed is listed. If closure announced in evening, considered to apply to next day. Some states only applied order to public schools.
column5: If closure announced in evening, considered to apply to next day. If closure announced on weekend, first week day closed is listed.
column9: *Clear social distancing requirements is defined as a mandate that gatherings must be less than 10 people and/or adherence to CDC social distance guidelines
column13: May be closed as part of non-essential business closures
